content:encoded:
Nick Carter, Master Detective is up first on Case Closed this week. We hear The Professor’s Secret, his story from April 1, 1944.

(30:39) Our second story is Murder Incorporated, the November 12, 1947, episode from Boston Blackie.

Download CaseClosed716

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you would like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more info. Thank you.
